title: Are there companies which can provide B2B information such as installed technologies for target companies? - Quora

response.answer_text: In other words, it is the profiling of target accounts based on their technology stack, or technographics: What Are Technographics? How to Target Accounts Using Technology Tracking - Uplead UpLead lead database, for example, allows you to build such targeted lists of prospects based on the technology stack that companies and contacts use.It tracks over 16,000 technologies like analytics, CRM, marketing automation tools So, for example, If you want to find organizations that use WordPress or Salesforce, for example, you can build a list of those companies. Here is how it looks like:  Technographic profiling allows you to answer questions like: What hardware or software do your target audience use?Do they have remarketing technology installed on their website?Do they use a marketing stack or all-in-one marketing automation?These data can make your firmographic data more robust and is especially effective for a SaaS product, as you can easily identify the customers of your biggest competitors.

Intricately provides complete visibility into the technologies used by a company, and how much they spend. We monitor the use case, the traffic, and the cost to estimate the amount a company is spending. We also use network detection to identify the technologies, which allows us to see the front-end web based tech, infrastructure, and back-end. Check it out, it’s free :)

Depends on the kind of products you are after but HG Data provides a very extensive list of installed technologies. The core database is behind the firewall hardware/software installations across the globe.

Datanyze is a tool we’ve used in the past, here at Clickback. Adding that extra bit of knowledge in our email campaigns drastically increased our open, click-through and conversion rate. Hope that helps!
